mapper.insert: insert into restaurant_table (res_name, res_tel, category, res_postcode, res_address, res_detailAddress, res_extraAddress , owner_no) values (#{res_name}, #{res_tel}, #{category}, #{res_postcode}, #{res_address}, #{res_detailAddress}, #{res_extraAddress}, #{owner_no})
mapper.select: select res_no, res_name, res_regdate, category, permission, permit_date, res_thumbnail from restaurant_table where res_no > 0 order by res_no desc, res_regdate desc
select res_no, res_name, res_regdate, category, permission, permit_date, res_thumbnail from restaurant_table where category = #{category} order by res_no desc, res_regdate desc
select * from restaurant_table order by res_no desc, res_regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, ${perPageNum}
mapper.update: update restaurant_table set permission= "OK", permit_date = now(), permit_admin = #{permit_admin} where res_no = #{res_no}
mapper.select: select permission from restaurant_table where owner_no = #{owner_no}
mapper.update: update restaurant_table set res_thumbnail = #{res_thumbnail}, res_tel = #{res_tel}, res_intro = #{res_intro} where res_no = #{res_no}
